Name: FiberTite to plywood checklist (Sound Stage Gutters)
Visual inspection of substrate ready for SWP
QA document received from previous trade from main contractor
Visual check no screws/nails/fixings popping up
Visual check that joints are flush and even
Substrate clean and dry. Free from dirt/debris contamination and ready for membrane
Wipe and clean laps prior to welding
Probe of seam with QA hook
Installed correctly according to specifications ( right way around )
Fixing and welding done according to specifications and details
Probe of seam with QA hook
Over flashings has a separation barrier
Fixings done according to specifications and details
All installation work completed, checked and reviewed as per specifications
